profile.name: Mario
profile.title: Product Designer @ Ukio | UX Design | SaaS
profile.description: I am an enthusiastic designer based in Valladolid, Spain. I have been a team player inside product design teams in the last 14 years, eager to learn and help startups grow in consulting, GIS mapping, retail and real estate sectors. Joining from the early stages of small and big product companies, improving customer experience through good design. I am passionate about product, technology, visual design, branding, information architecture, and user experience.

location.notes: Autocompleted using Google Maps API (id: ChIJk27GCIxyRw0R72uiHNSS_7M)

interestingFacts.fact: I have participated as a volunteer in tech events and doing reviews of comic book readings, on the other hand I like to draw digital illustrations, playing with videogames, boardgames, D&D roleplaying, or LEGO, and finally reading comic books or cycling to refresh the mind.

recommendations.title: Design Patterns Catalogue
recommendations.summary: IF curates this catalogue to help teams design trustworthy services that work for people. Contact IF for workshops about how to use these patterns.

challenges.description:
Improved the productivity of sales teams through the development of a booking management system within a new internal product, creating new bookings and managing transactions before payment.

Developed functionalities to attend customer requests after confirmation of a reservation for +1000 apartments in different regions, working cross-functionally with supply, design, operations and sales teams.

Increased low seasonality bookings in different regions through managing apartment prices from functionality for apartment management within real estate software product.

Collaborated with the lead product manager on multiple website features, including a new booking, apartment search, property detail, and check-out increasing online bookings through building a self-service website.

Redesigned Replenishment module (representing 40% of global MRR) including a new design system for retail software product, decreasing critical errors by 85% and increasing NPS.

Researched Store Transfers functionality (representing 20% of global MRR) generating trust in our customers we prevented a high percentage from churning, collaborating with product manager and development team.

Led new products based on user and market research insights and product metrics analysis. Buying & Allocation solutions with new use cases which meant an increase in usage and therefore revenue.

Collaborated with growth and sales team to design and develop the responsive website using HTML, CSS and JS, including a new component library to increase the clients, raising initial funding round and closing the Series A.

Designed and developed landing pages for the website (HTML, CSS, JS and Jekyll markdown) including blog posts to increase the rate of clients and preparing the next funding round, closing the Series B a few months later.

Collaborated with design and development team, to implement new features within the data visualization in maps software, applying the feedback received from users to increase the NPS and improving acquisition rate.

Created new features within the data visualization in graphs software, researching with product and tech team to identify problems and pain points of all clients through usability testing to improve the success rate.

Designed landing pages for the website, including new strategies with lead product manager to increase the rate of Datapad early adopters measured by analytics tools.

Develop mobile apps both native and hybrid of different areas, e-commerce food and automotive including customer success increasing surveys submissions to know feedback of all customers.

Collaborated with product owners and developers to build multiple responsive web applications including aeronautics, financial, postal mail, transport and e-commerce to increase the completion rate.

Developed responsive websites with HTML / CSS and web standards

Collaborated within a team of 5 developers and creating web applications, coding with Java and Javascript.

Designed websites and web applications for clients and small companies

Developed responsive websites with HTML / CSS

Designed logos, corporate image for small companies, including different printing elements like id cards, brochures, folders, posters, t-shirt, stands, and so on.

Created illustrations for websites and print elements
Developed an desktop application for the management and maintenance of the components of a car through MS Visual Basic and MS Access for the B.E.A. laboratory at Renault factory in Valladolid.

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription:
My perfect job would have a good company culture and a good working atmosphere where the knowledge should flow between team mates so that we can learn from each other.

I would like the project to be challenging so I can improve day by day, and where early, mid and late term expectations are clear, surrounded by like-minded professionals who care about and like their work. 

I consider myself an individual contributor although in some past work experiences I have been design team leader and felt comfortable in that position. 

My ideal work day is one in which both my team mates and I are excited about the project, there is a safe space to share doubts and concerns with an atmosphere of respect.
manfredSpecificData.goodPractices:
In my first startup job collaborated with the design and development team, to implement new features applying the feedback received from users to increase the NPS and improving acquisition rate.

I like to work with a user-centered design and if possible having metrics that give us light, understanding and analyzing their problems and needs, to provide the best solution.

Finally in visual design step I like to build design systems and to work on defining the foundations and library of components to be used in the product, website or whatever piece of design each member of the design team is working on in order to be consistent.
